CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 23, 1946, pg. 27, reads: "They'll Play 'Em All - Here are the Wilkinsburg Cavalettes, one of the best girl teams in this district who are anxious to play other feminine quintets this season.  The team is managed by Mrs. Gertrude Cleage of 1445 Montier Street in Wilkinsburg.  Her telephone number is Churchill 3713.  They are ready to meet and play teams in the Tri-State area. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Wilkinsburg Cavalettes women's basketball team, with girl seated on floor holding basketball, posed in gymnasium
